text: John Lawrence "Lorne" Stewart (c. 1909 - September 29, 1968) was a Canadian curler. He was the third of the 1934 Brier Champion team (skipped by his Leo Johnson), representing Manitoba."Obituaries", Winnipeg Free Press, Monday, September 30, 1968, Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada ==References== Category:Brier champions Category:1900s births Category:1968 deaths Category:Curlers from Manitoba Category:Sportspeople from Winnipeg Category:Canadian male curlers
title: Lorne Stewart
